BITD.vice_faith_description: You're dedicated to an unseen power, forgotten god, ancestor, etc.
BITD.vice_gambling_description: You crave games of chance, betting on sporting events, etc.
BITD.vice_luxury_description: Expensive and/or ostentatious displays of opulence.
BITD.vice_obligation_description: You're devoted to a family, a cause, a charity, etc.
BITD.vice_pleasure_description: Gratification from lovers, food, drink, drugs, art, theater, etc.
BITD.vice_stupor_description: You seek oblivion in the abuse of drugs, drink to excess, getting beaten to a pulp in the fighting pits, etc.
BITD.vice_weird_description: You experiment with strange essences, consort with rogue spirits, observe bizarre rituals or taboos, etc.
